cause.description:
http://www.johnmccain.com/
To see John McCain's stance on the issues, go to http://www.johnmccain.com/Informing/Issues/ !
1. John McCain has a remarkable record of leadership and experience that embodies his unwavering lifetime commitment to service.
cause.mission: Elect John McCain with Rudy Giuliani as his runningmate
cause.name: John McCain!
